nodes.text: Ort Hoogra-D'En maintained a base on the planet Pallaxides during the Galactic Civil War. He used the location as a base of operations to harvest tamack to build spore bombs to conduct a campaign of terrorism against the Galactic Empire. The base was protected by fahla, a sensor-dampening water plant that allowed Hoogra-D'en to hide the base's power generator and starships. The based was attacked by the Empire in retaliation for the bombing of the Syndaar Military Prep School.
